message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $9000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8000 for it. I think it's a fair price considering the value you mentioned.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go down to $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8500. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value you mentioned earlier.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $7800. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to make another concession. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7200 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value you mentioned earlier.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $7400. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to make another concession. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value you mentioned earlier.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $7100. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to make another concession. However, I've reached my budget limit and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm willing to pay $6900 for the product. This is my final offer.
